content: I didn't notice till I saw #10208 that when compose box is opened users that are not part of the stream gets blurred out. Does anyone else had a similar experience?
yeah, this is intentional, but I think basically a misfeature as implemented. Almost no one who isn't told about it recognizes what the feature is (and that it is intentional).
Did you investigate reordering into groups of users, eg in-stream or in-topic at top?
